title: PUBLIC NOTICES – Amends, repeals, and adds to existing law to provide for the electronic publication of public notices on the state controller’s website and certain abbreviated newspaper publications by governmental entities and to revise provisions regarding publication by first class mail.
subject: BUSINESS AND BUSINESS ENTITIES
